-M55d02SNAgwAc2rUES6.fulldes:
Este proyecto se centra en el trabajo con niños en condiciones especiales (síndrome de Down, niñas afectadas por la violencia doméstica, síndrome de Asperger, Cáncer entre otros) y fomenta su aprendizaje a través de las artes. Encontraría actividades artísticas como teatro, tocar música, cantar, bailar y hacer manualidades. El impacto no se hará solo en la comunidad, también ocurrirá en usted. ¡Ven a Cali, Colombia y sé parte de este hermoso proyecto!
Main activities
Desarrolle espacios creativos, amigables y divertidos para los niños.

Brindar acompañamiento a los alumnos en diferentes actividades (arte, música, teatro, danza).

Comparta su propia habilidad al explorar temas relacionados con ella.

Generar una planificación de las actividades a realizar que fortalezcan el vínculo intercultural.

Servir logística en eventos de muestra ofrecidos por los estudiantes.

Participe en los eventos interculturales de AIESEC. Asista a las sesiones principales de AIESEC
-M55d02SNAgwAc2rUES6.name: PROYECTARTE - Powerful Actions - Cali, Colombia
-M55d02SNAgwAc2rUES6.role: Es obligatorio que todos los aprendices de AIESEC en Colombia vengan con un seguro internacional durante todo el tiempo de su pasantía. AIESEC en Colombia le sugiere que lo compre con nuestro socio nacional TRAVEL KID.
-M55d02SNAgwAc2rUES6.shortdes: By 2030, empower and promote the social, economic and political inclusion of all, irrespective of age, sex, disability, race, ethnicity, origin, religion or economic or other status

-M5DMatxR9lP4E2qlChh.fulldes: Let's green the world with your lovely "fingers" and spread your environment-friendly spirits to society! Green With Fingers provides you a space to deep into organic agricultural knowledge, broaden your horizon on Vietnamese ecology through practical experiences and deliver inspirational lessons to the young on environmental affection and conservation. Happy Vegi's fresh gardens are identical places to feel the "natural beat of nature" through the non-chemical process and biological treatment.
-M5DMatxR9lP4E2qlChh.name: GREEN WITH FINGERS ~ Dating with nature
-M5DMatxR9lP4E2qlChh.shortdes: By 2020, achieve the environmentally sound management of chemicals and all wastes throughout their life cycle, in accordance with agreed international frameworks, and significantly reduce their release to air, water and soil in order to minimize their adverse impacts on human health and the environment

-M5NFPWx_AaJryPzWyjU.fulldes: Despite the considerable progress on education access and participation over the past years, 262 million children and youth aged 6 to 17 were still out of school in 2017, and more than half of children and adolescents are not meeting minimum proficiency standards in reading and mathematics. Good Morning Bangalore aims to educate children and adults alike on various subjects, mainly English and Mathematics, using various unconventional methods from sessions and to consistent weekly evaluation Despite the considerable progress on education access and participation over the past years, 262 million children and youth aged 6 to 17 were still out of school in 2017, and more than half of children and adolescents are not meeting minimum proficiency standards in reading and mathematics. Good Morning Bangalore aims to educate children and adults alike on various subjects, mainly English and Mathematics, using various unconventional methods from sessions and to consistent weekly evaluation
-M5NFPWx_AaJryPzWyjU.name: Feel Education - Good Morning India (Art)
-M5NFPWx_AaJryPzWyjU.shortdes: By 2030, ensure that all girls and boys complete free, equitable and quality primary and secondary education leading to relevant and effective learning outcomes
